Texts.Chs: 我发现自己不小心登记成为了一位翼族飞升者，我想我也许可以充分利用它，顺其自然。如果需要的话，我会被选中从塔上跳下去，我有一个从科技发展部借来的喷气背包。这太令人兴奋了！
Texts.Eng: Having found myself accidentally enrolled as an Avian Ascendant, I figured I might as well make the most of it and go with the flow. If it comes to it, and I'm chosen to leap off the tower, I have this jetpack I borrowed from the Miniknog. So exciting!

Texts.Chs: 想象一下：平木·圣咏，翼族之神。我敢打赌，他是史上第一个鲛人族的翼族神祗！然而，与此同时，我意外地开始翻找我的一个同学的物品，我应该找到什么呢？绿手指令人愉悦的力量——助力液！
Texts.Eng: Imagine that; Hiraki Corale, Avian god. The first Hylotl Avian god in history, I'd wager! In the meantime, however, I accidentally started rummaging through one of my fellow student's belongings, and what should I find? Greenfinger's delightful Strengthsap elixir!

Texts.Chs: 现在，我最喜欢的莫过于品尝绿手指的调制品，但助力液一直是我的最爱之一。我忍不住喝了一小口，最后把所有的都喝光了。我真是太坏坏了！我希望的那只鸟不要介意！
Texts.Eng: Now, I like nothing more than tasting Greenfinger's concoctions, but the Strengthsap has always been one of my favourites. I couldn't resist taking a sip, and ended up drinking the whole lot. So naughty! I hope the Avian who I borrowed it from doesn't mind!
